title: The Hobbit
summary: A hobbit named Bilbo is swept into a grand adventure to reclaim a treasure guarded by a dragon. Along the way, he discovers courage, loyalty, and friendship.
In a dystopian future, Winston Smith rebels against a totalitarian regime that monitors every aspect of life. The story explores themes of control and resistance.

title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
summary: A young boy discovers he's a wizard and enters a magical world filled with danger, mystery, and deep friendships.

title: All Quiet on the Western Front
summary: A German soldier recounts the horrors of World War I, exploring the brutality and emotional toll of combat.

title: Pride and Prejudice
summary: Elizabeth Bennet navigates social expectations and personal growth in this romantic tale of wit, pride, and love.

title: The Catcher in the Rye
summary: Holden Caulfield wanders through New York City as he grapples with adolescence, alienation, and identity.

title: The Alchemist
summary: Santiago, a young shepherd, follows a dream across deserts and cities in search of his personal legend.

title: The Book Thief
summary: A girl in Nazi Germany finds comfort in books and words as the world around her descends into chaos.

title: The Little Prince
summary: A pilot meets a strange boy from another planet, who teaches him lessons about love, loneliness, and human nature.

title: Life of Pi
summary: After a shipwreck, a boy survives on a lifeboat with a Bengal tiger. A story of survival, faith, and the nature of truth.
